newsitem.title: POLAND: INVESTORS BID FOR PLN 1.073 BLN OF POLISH T-BILLS.
newsitem.headline: INVESTORS BID FOR PLN 1.073 BLN OF POLISH T-BILLS.

text.p: Investors bid for 1.073 billion zlotys worth of Polish T-bills at the weekly primary tender against a one billion zloty offer, the National Bank of Poland said.
Full details of the auction should be available later today.
